mapper.update: update T_sales set T_sales.stele=#{stale} where sales_id=#{sales_id}
mapper.select: select t.sales_no,t.order_id,t.cause_time,dd.order_money as zongjia,t.cause_type,t.sales_cause,t.cause_explain,dd.order_state,dd.user_id,US.nickname from T_sales t join t_order dd ON dd.order_id=t.order_id join t_user US ON US.id=dd.user_id

SELECT s.*,t.*,
pt. name producttypename, pt. id producttypeid, p.name productName, p.image image,
p.create_time create_times, p.state state,
p.describes describion
FROM t_product p join t_product_type pt on p.product_type_id = pt.id
join t_classification tc on pt.classification_id = tc.id join t_shopping t on t.product_id=p.id JOIN t_order r on r.order_no=t.order_id JOIN t_sales s on s.order_id=r.order_id where s.stele=#{stale} and s.user_id=#{user_id} and sales_no=#{no}
